bio.heading: Who is Rohan Shrestha?
description: Back in 2019, I decided to try my hand at creating custom Website and tumbled head first into the rabbit hole of coding and web development.
Fast forward to today, I've built many projects , ranging from Ecommerces websites,with focus on fast, elegant and user friendly experiences.
When I'm not coding, I'm regularly playing football, both online and in real life, practicing boxing and making music.
